text: Islamabad Electric Supply Company (IESCO) is an electric utility company in Islamabad, incorporated in 1998. IESCO was formed in 1998 to take over the assets, functions and responsibilities of the erstwhile Islamabad Area Electricity Board, which was then a division of WAPDA. IESCO's core function is to supply, distribute and sell power (electricity) in the area from Attock to Jhelum, and from the river Indus to River Neelum in Kashmir. It services 2.8 million consumers directly, but touches the lives of more than 25 mln people living in the 6 districts its services. Current CEO of IESCO : Mr. Shahid Iqbal Choudhry == References == ==External Link== * http://www.iesco.com.pk Category:Distribution companies of Pakistan Category:Companies based in Islamabad Category:Energy companies established in 1998 Category:Pakistani companies established in 1998
title: Islamabad Electric Supply Company
